src_original: nantakair veṣṭitvā mandaṃ sārayitavyaṃ /  Poṣ-v 11.6. tathāpi pracālayanti /
(Poṣ-v 278)  Poṣ-v 11.7. bhikṣavo 'ndhakāre kṣipanti /  sa na paśyati /  bhagavān āha /
sūtrakair baddhvā kṣeptavyaḥ tato 'pi pratikarṣitavyaḥ {Cf. SHT VIII (Erg.)  1033r4: tataḥ paścāt punar ākarṣitavyaḥ} /
Poṣ-v 13.1. te tatra na māpayanti /  bhagavān āha /  upariṣṭād dvitīyaṃ puraṃ kartavyaṃ /
bhagavān āha /  na dvārakoṣṭhake yogo vāhayitavyaḥ /  Poṣ-v 6.3. te prāsāde vāhayanti /  sa evādīnavo bhavati /
na bhikṣuṇā prāsāde yogo vāhayitavyaḥ /  Poṣ-v 6.4. te layane vāhayanti /
etat prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣavo bhagavata ārocayanti /  bhagavān āha /
